blog.name: voicemailsfrompeterparker
blog.title: Voicemails From Peter Parker
blog.description:
A collection of voicemail transcriptions from Peter Parker to Tony Stark.
Documented by F.R.I.D.A.Y and @foxbowl (updates every Friday). 

Click here to see Peter's voicemails in chronological order!
Request for a voicemail and F.R.I.D.A.Y. will try to find it in her archives ↓

tags: haven't seen Captain Marvel yet and it's killing me inside
summary: ————————————————————— Voicemail #37 To: Tony Stark From: Peter Parker Hey, Mr. Stark. Uh, so the average amount of cats I’ve...
body:
—————————————————————

Voicemail #37

To: Tony Stark

From: Peter Parker

Hey, Mr. Stark. Uh, so the average amount of cats I’ve saved from trees this week has gone up from 8 to 10 so that’s nice. Nothing else really happened, except I sat on a park bench with some peanut butter on it today and it got smeared all over the bottom of my suit and there’s nothing more mortifying than having various dogs chase me around trying sniff my butt all day while I’m rescuing people.

Also, Aunt May now wants to know if my suit is machine-washable.

—————————————————————

blog.name: justincorrectmarvelquotes
blog.title: I Swear They Said it
blog.description: "Act up, you can get smashed up." -City Girls

question: Maybe regular truth or dare?
answer:
This took a turn and I kind of liked it too much not to post it🤷‍♂️ This is inspo from a headcanon someone else made tho so🤙

“Okay, Tony, truth or dare?” Natasha asked. The whole team was sitting on the carpet in a circle enjoying a calming night of fun games between one another.

Tony hesitated a moment before taking a deep breath, “truth.” he answered with a slight wince. Natasha sat deep in thought for a moment, thinking of the proper question to ask.

“What’s your phobia?” She asked, her eyes narrowing at her friend. Stark raised an eyebrow in confusion.

“My phobia?”

She nodded with a smile and all eyes fell on Tony at once. 

He swallowed thickly, hesitant once again. His mind raced with thoughts and warning signals begging him not to tell, knowing they would just make fun of him. He hated the fact that he hid things from his team, especially these kinds of things. They were meant to be close and sincere, and it sucked that he was afraid of being depreciated by them. He wanted to be known as the calloused man in armor. The man that can be broken by nothing. But he’s not. He has to sleep with a nightlight plugged into the wall. His eyes soon fell on Peter who sat beside him, listening intently to the answer.

To be honest, he didn’t want him knowing either. Peter was supposed to look up to Tony and admire him. He does do that and once Tony opens his mouth that will be the end.

But what if it’s not.

Something then clicked with Tony and he took another deep breath.

“The dark,” he said casually, surprised at how even his tone was. He took the scotch he had been drinking earlier and downed the rest of it shielding his gaze from the rest of the crew.

“Yo, me too!” Bucky exclaimed unusually happily. He shot up his hand and Tony slowly high fived him an edge of a smile pulling at his lips.

“Really?” Tony asked, wincing once again. Bucky nodded hastily, pulling his legs into a criss-cross pattern.

“Yeah, I keep my phone screen on during the night.”

Steve pointed to the soldier next to him and nodded as well. “Yeah, I’m scared of heights.” He declared.

“Snakes.” Stephen chimed in, awkwardly with a hand raised. Tony looked at him his heartwarming. It felt reassuring to know he wasn’t the only one with common fears. Peter suddenly cleared his throat.

“Uh, claustrophobia.” He said, warily, looking at his outstretched feet. Tony smiled at the boy and put an arm around him tightly.

blog.name: marvelheroesassemble
blog.title: Marvel Your Universe
blog.description:
Will

Big huge and die hard Marvel fan.

Love all things Marvel and the MCU.

Love the Avengers.

Especially, the Original Six.

Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, the Hulk,

Black Widow and Hawkeye.

Robert Downey, Jr., Chris Evans,

Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo,

Scarlett Johansson and Jeremy Renner.

They’re my babies.

They hold a very special place in my heart.

All of them are legendary and iconic.

Love all the other heroes too.

Marvel is my Inspiration and my home!

"Avengers Assemble"

summary: Peter P: *trips over a couple of bottles of hydrochloric acid Tony accidentally left out* Peter P: *falls on his face, leaving a...
body:
Peter P: *trips over a couple of bottles of hydrochloric acid Tony accidentally left out*

Peter P: *falls on his face, leaving a bruise*

*couple of hours later*

Tony: kID!!! What happened to your face?

Peter P: oh nothing, i was just tripping on acid and then i got a bruise

Tony: when did you start doing drugs peter???

Peter P: … wait what

summary:
Primera temporada de esta serie que intento aprovechar el éxito del MCU.
La serie empieza bastante débil con capítulos aburridos...
body:
Avengers assemble (season 1)

Primera temporada de esta serie que intento aprovechar el éxito del MCU.

La serie empieza bastante débil con capítulos aburridos que lo único que te hacen es esperara con desesperación el final, conforme la temporada avanza la narrativa mejora y logra un final de temporada sólido.

El malhechor de turno de esta temporada es Red Skull con otros aliados que deciden formar el Cabal para dominar el mundo.

3.5 de 5

title: Inherent Comfort
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Uu65Gb

by DobbyRocksSocks

Tony is there for all of the team always. He’s still surprised when they want to be there for him in return.

Words: 2347, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Mini-Fics

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

  • Additional Tags: Tony Loves His Team, The team love Tony, Friendship/Family/Team fluff, Nightmares, Attempted running away by Bruce, All the family things, Just a big old hunk of love and fluff, 5+1 Fic

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: An Affair Among Flowers
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HqkBej

by NotEvenCloseToStraight

A Commission from my Tumblr:

Omega!Steve is short and sassy and has no intention of finding an Alpha ever, but at Bucky and Tony’s wedding he catches the eye of one very tall, very good looking, very Alpha Thor Odinson and everything changes.

Thor takes one look at the scrappy little Omega and knows they are meant to be mates. Steve might take a little more convincing, so a little kissing will just have to happen. (bummer, right?)
***************

“You were smiling as you watched our friends saw their vows.” Thor took a step closer and suddenly their little corner was smaller, more intimate, and that same flash of heat that had flooded Steve during the ceremony came back in a rush, his chest tightening as he tried to just breathe in the Alpha’s presence. “And I thought I’d never seen an Omega so beautiful. You were nearly disappearing into the flowers there beneath the willow tree arch and I thought perhaps you were a forest nymph, a tiny fae come to watch and bask in the happiness of the wedding. I was quite afraid if I got too close, you might spirit yourself away.”

(*Warning: this is so sweet and mushy your teeth might fall out. )

blog.name: justincorrectmarvelquotes
blog.title: I Swear They Said it
blog.description: "Act up, you can get smashed up." -City Girls

summary: Peter fell asleep on the celing.
question: Peter fell asleep on the celing.
answer:
Oof short but here.

“Peter?” Tony called, stepping into the boys compound bedroom. It was nearly eleven o’clock and the boy had school tomorrow so Tony was on top of getting the kid to sleep. He knew how bad it was to concentrate on the wrong hours of sleep.

“Peter, let’s go, you’re 16 I don’t need to tell you to go to bed,” Tony announced, clasping his hands together as he looked around the room. 

He had been looking after Peter for many nights like these, ever since Peter was a true Avengers. May had appreciated the help a lot since she worked mostly during the day and hated leaving Peter alone a lot of the time. 

Tony and she soon become tag parents and helped each other out as much as they can. driving out to see decathlon tournaments, and helping with the getting ready portion of dances. Tony had to admit, he loved letting Peter borrow his cars to drive to get together’s with friends or to school and giving him lessons on repairing certain things. he felt like he was really there for someone. It felt good.

He sighed and gazed around the kid’s bedroom one more time before getting ready to leave when suddenly, he heard a loud yelp and a large thud close behind him.

He whipped around to see the spider boy, on the ground, wincing a bit.

“What the hell?” Tony said, helping Peter to feet his carefully. The boy’s eyes drooped slightly as he yawned.

I was testing to see how long I can stay on the ceiling for and I fell asleep.” He said, drowsily. Tony snickered, laughing at Peter’s behavior. “Cool, that’s a sign that you need to sleep in your bed.” He said, through a chuckle.

Peter nodded slowly and jumped onto his mattress.
